Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: This restaurant is just amazing. Staff is very professional and kind, food is fantastic. It was perfect choice for our 3rd wedding anniversary dinner. We have really enjoyed our evening and left happy and full. Thank you!

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: Very nice place where eating a pizza is a special experience. Situated in a quite area 2 minutes from Rembrandt Plain they offer a large selection of pizza and daily dishes like pasta and meat.

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text:
Really poor experience, don't let the good reviews fool you.
The service was odd at best, removing our menus before we ordered etc, which I now know was because they were trying to pull a fast one on myself and my mother. ‚Ä¶

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: Five star service, food, attendance and dessert! Pure tastes and lovely music playing in the background. Totally recommended! :-)

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: Friendly service, delicious food and great home made Tiramisu. Recommended! The only comment I'd have is the noise level. Can get very loud when fully booked. Other than that great.

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: What started out as a lovely dinner ended up as one of our worst dining experiences. The restaurant is definitely short staffed and "the manager" is the one tending tables and bar. We waited over 50minutes for my husband's meal to come out, ‚Ä¶

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: Lovely food! Great hospitality, we really enjoyed our dinner here both times so far.

Name: Sale e Pepe
Review Text: A very disappointing experience. The prices are a bit high relative to the quality of the food and the service far from attentive. I suppose our expectations of 'authentic Italian cuisine' were too high. In fact, just ordinary food served by people who don't much care if the customer is taken care of.
